t: Sony Pictures International Productions And Pokeepsie Films, In Association With Amazon Prime Video, Launch “The Fear Collection” | Sony Pictures Entertainment
s: MADRID, on May 26th, 2020 - Sony ... with Amazon Prime Video, have closed a deal to launch ‘THE FEAR COLLECTION’. The Fear Collection brand will encompass an anthology of horror and suspense films guided by the creative influence of Álex de la Iglesia, who will produce and/or direct each project. The films will be initially theatrically released by Sony Pictures Entertainment Iberia and ...

t: Alamo Drafthouse Cinemas Sells to Sony Pictures Entertainment
s: June 12, 2024 - Alamo Drafthouse Cinemas has sold to Sony Pictures Entertainment but will continue to operate its theaters under the brand name
